title: Pf2e Warlord
description:
An Homebrewed Warlord for Pathfinder 2e 
Based on u/fanatic66's design on Reddit
Updated and Implemented in Foundry by Nythz

warlord.label: Warlord
warlord.description: Actions or Spells with this trait relate to the Warlord Class

command.label: Command
command.description: A command ability can only affect allies that can either hear and understand the command or see the person giving the command. You or an ally can only follow one command at a time. If you give a command to a creature already targeted by one of your commands this turn, then any ongoing effects from your previous command end immediately unless specified otherwise.
